metadata.name: Sahara Milky Way
metadata.description:
Sahara Milky Way 1/1

Was a warm spring night in a faraway place, in the land where beduins roam undisturbed and where your eyes wander on endless sand dunes.

All my fellow travelers were sleeping but not me, so i decided to move slightly away from the camp to admire the desert and the sky in their magnificence.
Initially i was a little bit afraid of being alone, but that feeling was replaced immediately when i looked up towards the sky. 

I was not alone at all!

Millions and millions of stars were shining in the sky, watching on me and keeping me safe.
Whenever i think about that night a faint smile appears on my face and a glimpse of that gorgeous night sky shines into my eyes.
